name: It's your funeral!
description:
In It's Your Funeral! you assume the role of Alice, a woman who is recently deceased and mysteriously shows up at her own funeral after her epic 33rd birthday party. Why is she there? How did she die? Was she murdered? Did she slit her wrists? Did she die of a drug overdose? Meet the interesting characters in her life and find out what happened in this wry, interactive experience.

Credits:

  • Sacha Siskonen @SachaSiskonen - words
  • Alex Borucki @protospasm - images
  • Ben Gemmel @paracatgames - design

Used with permission under creative commons or other open licenses (no changes were made except compression):

  • Title/Ending Music:"Higekitekina (悲劇的な)" by Fabian Measures http://freemusicarchive.org/music/Fabian_Measures/...
